check.name: MultiFileRegexpHeader
check.description: Checks the header of a source file against multiple header files that contain a pattern for each line of the source header.

property.name: fileExtensions
property.description: Specify the file extensions of the files to process.

property.name: headerFiles
property.description: Specify a comma-separated list of files containing the required headers. If a source file's header does not match any of the specified header files, the violation will be reported with reference to the first file in this list. This allows users to designate a preferred or primary header for reporting purposes by its order in the list.
